Sec. 8A-80. Director of Trade Standards; inspectors.
The County Manager is authorized to establish a division or Office of Trade Standards, which shall be operated under his administrative direction, supervision and control. The office may be called the Trade Standards Office or other suitable title, as the Manager may determine. The County Manager shall have power to appoint a Director of Trade Standards and such inspectors and other personnel as necessary to perform the duties prescribed by this article and administrative orders. The Director and his Secretary shall be in the exempt service.
